Class PuzzleCreator

java.lang.Object
PuzzleCreator
public class PuzzleCreator
extends java.lang.Object
Class to enable creation of 4096 encrypted unique puzzles and capability save them to a binary file.
Since:
2020-11-30
Author:
lizks

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PuzzleCreator()
    An empty constructor

  • Constructor Details

    • PuzzleCreator

      public PuzzleCreator()
      An empty constructor

  • Method Details

    • createPuzzles

      public java.util.ArrayList<Puzzle> createPuzzles()
      A createPuzzles method that generates and returns an ArrayList of 4096 Puzzle objects. Arraylist is returned in a random order
      Returns:
      merklePuzzles an unordered arrayList which includes 4096 puzzles (not encrypted)

    • createRandomKey

      public byte[] createRandomKey()
      A createRandomKey method that returns a byte array that can be used to form a DES key. This byte array should be in the above specified format (final 48 bits should be zeros).
      Returns:
      a byte array that holds the byte of a Secret Key key

    • encryptPuzzle

      public byte[] encryptPuzzle​(byte[] keyArray, Puzzle thisPuzzle)
      An encryptPuzzle method that takes a byte array representing a key and a puzzle object and encrypts the puzzles byte representation into a byte array representing the encrypted puzzle. The method should return this byte array. Note that if completed correctly the resulting byte array will be 32 bytes in length.
      Parameters:
      keyArray - A byte array that holds the bytes of a secret key
      thisPuzzle - a puzzle that is not encrypted
      Returns:
      a single encrypted puzzle

    • encryptPuzzlesToFile

      public void encryptPuzzlesToFile​(java.lang.String filename)
      An encryptPuzzlesToFile method that takes as a parameter a String representing a filename (e.g. 'puzzles.bin') and encrypts all 4096 puzzles and also writes them to a binary file (the byte data as it is, no spaces or new lines) with given name.
      Parameters:
      filename - A string filename

    • findKey

      public javax.crypto.SecretKey findKey​(int puzzleNumber)
      A findKey method that take as a parameter an int representing a puzzle number and returns the key for that puzzle as a SecretKey object.
      Parameters:
      puzzleNumber - An integer value of the puzzleNumber
      Returns:
      key The key specific to the puzzleNumber given

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
